title: Poor battery life and blurred selfie camera pics on brand new P5
content:
I have switched to dark mode, I have switched from 5G to LTE, I only have necessary GPS running, battery optimizer is activated, no Bluetooth/wifi scanning, etc. My battery only seems to last half a day and I wouldn't consider myself a heavy cell phone user. I send the occasional Snapchat message throughout the day, some web browsing, some photography, etc. I'm not streaming movies and music all day or anything like that! 

I was really looking forward to having a phone that I wouldn't have to carry a charger around for it! So unfortunate. I thought these were supposed to have decent batteries? Is it possibly faulty?

I have a feeling I was spoiled with the P3 dual selfie camera. The detail on this P5 is really lacking.
